title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 63.6 - Investments by savings banks life insurance fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 63.6 - Investments by savings banks life insurance fund

State Regulations

Savings banks life insurance fund may invest in the capital
stock, capital notes and debentures of a savings banks trust company or service
agency, provided the aggregate amount of its investments in such stock, notes
and debentures, including the proposed investment, would not exceed the greater
of two percent of its total assets or $20,000. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
63.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
